Job Description

Right now, our top sales people earn in excess of $110,000 per year and some well over 6 figures…Are you earning that much? American Home Remodeling specializes in bath remodeling with a range of products geared towards today’s homeowner and their needs. Since 2002 American Home Remodeling has serviced Southern California providing free in-home consultations and is a recognized leader in the industry.

At the moment, there is higher demand for our products than ever before: our industry is expected to grow even more in the coming year. Today we have more leads and appointment requests than representatives willing to run them! We're looking for experienced professionals with high selling skills, and younger professionals eager to work hard and learn the skills needed to excel. If you see yourself as a Closer, we'd love to speak to you more!

We Provide:

  • Pre-set and qualified appointments with interested homeowners
  • Comprehensive training with a proven system
  • High commissions and bonuses

You Need:

  • An ability and eagerness to learn
  • Outstanding communication skills
  • Selling Experience (recommended but not required)

Company Description

American Home Remodeling, Inc. is a family owned and operated Home Remodeling business located in Corona. We are passionate about making home remodeling dreams into realities for homeowners across southern California. We design and build custom home remodeling solutions, specializing in bathroom remodeling. Visit us at www.GOAHR.com!
